text: Past continuous may refer to: *Past continuous or past progressive, an English verb form (e.g. was writing) *Verb forms with similar meaning in some other languages; see Imperfect *Past Continuous, a novel by Yaakov Shabtai *Past Continuous, a novel by Neel Mukherjee ==See also== *Past tense *Continuous and progressive aspects Category:Linguistics disambiguation pages
title: Past continuous
